text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump Your father is campaigning every day of the week. 24/7. Every time he has a TV report on Coronavirus he campaign’s. He tweets every day all hours, even early hours of the morning. Getting free TV coverage which others don’t get it. Even Biden and other people running for office.
